content: this clear water cowl is an easy crochet pattern the end result is a beautiful light weight cowl great for any occasion a free copy of this crochet pattern can be found on my ad supported blog https //richtexturescrochet com a free video tutorial for this pattern can be found on my youtube channel https //www youtube com/c/richtexturescrochet/ skill level easy gauge 9 sts x 10 row of crossed double_crochet = 4 inches finished size 9 x 17 inches laid flat excluding pompom yarn refined by woolinterrupted 70% superwash merino 30% bamboo 100 g approx 382 yds fingering weight 1 you will need 1 skein/cowl hook size f/5 3 75 mm hook adjust hook size if necessary to obtain correct gauge
